description:
This is a custom game. Its just like challenge mode. You can load any challenges available on the workshop.

This mod is a 1:1 clone of challenge mode, but runs as a custom game mode. In the menu book, the host will be able to access the following settings:
[list]
[*] Hide all name tags 
[*] Hiders see name tags (seekers dont)
[*] Full health
[*] Half health
[*] 1 Shot Kill
[*] Spectate when dead
[*] Inactivity VFX (particle for when you sit still too long)
[*] Fall damage / Collision damage
[*] Player list to toggle between [b]Spectate | Hider | Seeker[/b]
[/list]
Not implemented yet:
[list]
[*] Inactivity VFX
[/list]

ALSO, the 3d model for switches has been replaced with buttons, and there is no longer a press animation

Bugs with LOW priority, are likely going to have zero effect on gameplay, usability, or other important aspects of the game. FIXED bugs are bugs currently in game, but are fixed in the dev version. Known bugs are:
[list]
[*]  [b]LOW PRIORITY[/b]
[list]
[*] [FIXED] Extra empty player exists the menu world
[*] [FIXED] Sometimes clients are loaded into a separate menu world
[/list]
[*]  [b]MEDIUM PRIORITY[/b]
[list]
[*] Currently able to select multiple health modes (1 shot + full health)
[/list]

The host is the only person with the "menu book". DO NOT drop it on the ground! You'll be stuck without it until you reload the entire save file.

Want to learn more about the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3141237343]Challenge Database[/url]?
name: Hide and Seek for Challenges
